title: As a user I want to be able to run the First Professional Organization Report
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/First+Professional+Organization+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/First+Professional+Organization+Report+Details

View Story: #151620899

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "First Professional Organization" is a report in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
* The category of this report should be "Pro Player Management". 
* Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
* The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: Rule 5 Draft Status batch updates
custom_steps:
Batch Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+5+Draft+Status+Batch

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The batch's rules with regard to when a player becomes R5 eligible if they have a voided contract have changed. 

Prior rule was: 
If a player's MNC is voided for reasons of a failed age/identity investigation, then when the player resigns with the same Org they are R5 eligible on the signing date of the new MNC. 
 
New rule is: 
If both the void and the re-sign by the voiding club occurred after 12/1/16, then that rule no longer applies - player will not be Rule 5 eligible based on the re-signing.  (However, that player may be Rule 5 eligible should he otherwise qualify)

title: As a user I want to be able to view the Pre-Draft tab for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_pre-draft
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_pre-draft

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Pre-Draft++tab+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Rule 4" dashboard visible on the Left Navigation menu. 
* A "Pre-Draft" tab will be available on the Rule 4 Dashboard. 
* Loading the tab will load the current Standard Selection Order. 
* Default order will be the reverse win order for the current, or most recently concluded season. In the case of a tie between two Orgs, look back as many seasons as are needed to break the tie. 
* The screen layout matches the wireframe.
* The comments box only displays in view mode if comments have been stored for the year currently being viewed.

title: As a user I want to be able to view the Pre-Draft tab for prior year Rule 4 Drafts
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_pre-draft
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_pre-draft

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Pre-Draft++tab+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a Year dropdown at the top of the page.
* Any year which the system has data for is displayed.
* Changing the year will reload the page to display the selected year's data.

title: As a BOC admin I want to be able to edit the Supplemental picks on the Pre-Draft tab for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_pre-draft

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Pre-Draft++tab+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
*This story covers both the Supplemental Picks Prior to Round 3 and the Supplemental Picks After Round 3 sections. All AC apply to both*
* Clicking edit will put the screen into Edit mode, per the wireframe.
* The user will see an "Add Row" button in edit mode for the Supplemental sections. 
* Clicking add row will add a new row in edit mode to the section. 
* Each added row will have a trash can icon.
* Clicking a trash can icon will remove the row from the table. 
* The available fields will match the wireframe and data discovery.
* The Player field is a quicksearch field - the population available is a list of all players that were drafted in the prior year's draft. 
* Anytime the page is in Edit mode, there is also a Cancel button and a Save button. 
* No changes made will be stored until the user clicks "Save". Clicking Save will run a required field and formatting check per the provided data discovery.
* Once the required field check has passed, the system will store the new order, reload the screen in View mode and display a blue successful save notification. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes. If they confirm, the screen will refresh in view mode with no changes stored. If they do not confirm, the popup will close and the user will remain in edit mode with their changes persisting.

title: As a BOC admin I want to be able to edit the Competitive Balance picks on the Pre-Draft tab for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_pre-draft

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Pre-Draft++tab+-+Data+Discovery


Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the Pre-Draft tab, there will be an "Edit" button for those users who have the Pre-Draft Editor permission. 
* No buttons appear for Viewers.
* Clicking edit will put the screen into Edit mode, per the wireframe.
* The user will have the ability to enter the Org for the 6 Competitive Balance Lottery A picks.
* The user will have the ability to select the Org for the 6 Competitive Balance Lottery B picks. 
* The user will be able to indicate if any of the picks were traded, and which Org the pick was traded to.  
* Anytime the Pre-Draft page is in edit mode, there is a comments box that users can edit existing or store new comments for the current year's Order.
* Anytime the page is in Edit mode, there is also a Cancel button and a Save button. 
* Clicking "Save" will store the new order, reload the screen in View mode and display a blue successful save notification. 
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to lose their changes. If they confirm, the screen will refresh in view mode with no changes stored. If they do not confirm, the popup will close and the user will remain in edit mode with their changes persisting.

title: Pre-Draft tab - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* There should be a Pre-Draft viewer LDAP. 
* There should be a Pre-Draft editor LDAP. 
* A user must have one of these two LDAPs to see the "Pre-Draft" tab on the Rule 4 dashboard. 
* LDAPs are added to the new permissions wiki.

title: Draft Order tab - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* There should be a Draft Order viewer LDAP. 
* There should be a Draft Order editor LDAP. 
* A user must have one of these two LDAPs to see the "Draft Order" tab on the Rule 4 dashboard. 
* LDAPs are added to the new permissions wiki.

title: As a Tester, I want to access the MLBPA Transaction API through the ebis link interface
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* Testers have a basic UI to select the API, and to supply input parameters
* They should also see the returned API response in a readable JSON format (with indents)
* The UI will have a basic Expand and collapse feature
* The UI should allow the tester to login with an API credential

title: As a BOC admin I want to be warned if I attempt to Generate the Draft Order for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft and it has already been manually modified
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_pre-draft

Generate Draft Order Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/3.+Generating+Draft+order+rules

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Generate Draft Order" will check if there is an existing draft order that has been manually edited (by using the manual override button on draft order tab). If yes, user sees a blocking message. See Messages #3.

title: As a user I want to be alerted if the Draft Order has been manually overridden for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
http://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_order

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking on the Draft Order tab will load the Rule 4 Draft Order for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft. 
* If the Draft Order for the upcoming Draft has been manually overriden, then a blue notification appears. See Messages #4
